#include <iostream>
#include <climits>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int ar[105];
int main() {
	int t,n,d,cnt,eatT;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		cnt=0,eatT=0;
		cin>>n>>d;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			cin>>ar[i];
			eatT+=ar[i];			
		}
		eatT+=(n-1)*10;
		if(eatT>d) {
			cout<<-1<<endl;
		}
		else {
			
			cnt=2*(n-1)+(d-eatT)/5;
			cout<<cnt<<endl;
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
	
}
